content: I couldn’t agree more. Even if you work in a newspaper or the publishing industry, the apathy towards the creative department is visible. I have been told my job can be done by anybody and that the company doesn’t need to pay someone to write and copy paste writings. Its such a blow to one’s self-esteem. Things are really getting messy for people in this business. People pay for all kinds of impermanent stuff, but not for something which provides them the stimulus and the necessary inspiration required.
